node.title: Dash & Dash NEXT partners with ThreeFold
node.excerpt: Dash / Dash NEXT and the ThreeFold Foundation are excited to officially announce their collaboration, effective the end of June 2020.

node.title: ThreeFold partners with Hewlett Packard Enterprise
node.excerpt: Dubai, UAE, Today at GITEX Technology Week, ThreeFold signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE)

node.title: ThreeFold partners with SKALE to empower its developer community
node.excerpt: SKALE and ThreeFold are excited to announce their collaborative partnership that will focus on solving scalability and decentralization limitations faced by Ethereum and Blockchain developers.

node.title: ThreeFold and Presearch partner to decentralize search nodes and storage
node.excerpt: Privacy and decentralization are some of the values shared by both Presearch and ThreeFold, at the core of their missions to create scalable technologies..

node.title: Why ThreeFold chose Stellar
node.excerpt: At ThreeFold, together with a beautiful ecosystem of partners, we are co-creating a peer-to-peer Internet that empowers equality, freedom, and sustainability.
